headers.subject: [tosdr:2026] Microsoft.com [info] Limitation of liability clause

html:
Pretty normal, and I don't think we need a point for this; but I still wanted to document it here for possible comment:

IN NO EVENT SHALL MICROSOFT AND/OR ITS RESPECTIVE SUPPLIERS BE LIABLE FOR ANY SPECIAL, INDIRECT OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES OR ANY DAMAGES WHATSOEVER RESULTING FROM LOSS OF USE, DATA OR PROFITS, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF CONTRACT, NEGLIGENCE OR OTHER TORTIOUS ACTION, ARISING OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE USE OR PERFORMANCE OF SOFTWARE, DOCUMENTS, PROVISION OF OR FAILURE TO PROVIDE SERVICES, OR INFORMATION AVAILABLE FROM THE SERVICES.
 
From <http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/legal/intellectualproperty/copyright/default.aspx> 

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

subject: Microsoft.com [info] Limitation of liability clause
text:
Pretty normal, and I don't think we need a point for this; but I still 
wanted to document it here for possible comment:

IN NO EVENT SHALL MICROSOFT AND/OR ITS RESPECTIVE SUPPLIERS BE LIABLE FOR 
> ANY SPECIAL, INDIRECT OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES OR ANY DAMAGES WHATSOEVER 
> RESULTING FROM LOSS OF USE, DATA OR PROFITS, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF 
> CONTRACT, NEGLIGENCE OR OTHER TORTIOUS ACTION, ARISING OUT OF OR IN 
> CONNECTION WITH THE USE OR PERFORMANCE OF SOFTWARE, DOCUMENTS, PROVISION OF 
> OR FAILURE TO PROVIDE SERVICES, OR INFORMATION AVAILABLE FROM THE SERVICES.
>  
> From <
> http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/legal/intellectualproperty/copyright/default.aspx
> > 

-- 
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
